}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== [http://web.archive.org/web/20121022162311/http://www.alfa.com.tw/in/front/bin/ptdetail.phtml?Part=AWUS036EW Old product page (via archive.org)] :They're apparently [http://sourceforge.net/projects/alfanetwork/files/Driver/RTL8187L_WIN.zip/download throwing their driver sets on '''SourceForge''']. <small>ಠ_ಠ</small>
Additional specifications, per '''ALFA Network''''s product page, follow... *5dBi dipole antenna included *Transmit power: 27dBm ± 2dBm *Receive sensitivity **-70dBm @ 54Mbps (OFDM) **-83.5dBm @ 11Mbps (CCK) *Dimensions (L x W x D): [[Dimensions::90 mm x 28 mm x 10 mm]]
